text: Leopold Hofmann (31 October 1905 – 9 January 1976) was an Austrian football midfielder. He played for First Vienna FC. He also played for Austrian national football team .Copa do Mundo da FIFA Itália 1934 ==Career== He started his career at Gersthofer SV. 1925 he went to Vienna. There he stayed till the end of his career in 1939. He became Champion and Cup-winner twice with the Vienna.1939 he came back to Gersthofer SV and finished his career there. ==International== He played 29 matches for the Austrian national football team and scored one goal. His first match was on 24 May 1925 a 3-1 away-loss versus Czechoslovakia. His last one was also a loss versus this team on 24 October 1937.ÖFB Players profile He was also a member of the team for the 1934 FIFA World Cup. ==Statistics== ===International=== Appearances and goals by national team and year National team Year Apps Goals Austria Austria 1925 1 0 Austria 1927 5 0 Austria 1928 2 0 Austria 1930 4 0 Austria 1931 2 0 Austria 1932 4 0 Austria 1934 3 0 Austria 1935 3 1 Austria 1936 1 0 Austria 1937 2 0 Total Total 27 1 ===International goals=== :As of match played 24 October 1937.
